attributes.action: Reduce the price of Arsenal football club tickets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As much as the emirates stadium is makeing a lot of money and getting full stadiums every week thier tickets are between £40 to £60 pounds and they are the cheap seats. There are so many people who would like to go to see the Arsenal but can't affort those kind of prices.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
